channel.title: Todu Tinige'-hu Siha gi 2021 on Dihan Dabit
channel.description: Recent content in Todu Tinige'-hu Siha gi 2021 on Dihan Dabit

item.title: Mama'titinas Diksion친rion Chamoru
item.description: H친fa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung ni' tumataitai esti! It’s been over a month-and-a-half since I’ve blogged and not a week has gone by where I thought to myself, “ai adai, debi di bai fa’tinas otru na blog”, but honestly my schedule has just been todu machalapon. I had to take a step back from dang near everything and reasses my priorities and how I spend my time outside of work - hence my absence 游땐.

item.title: Mama'titinas Trongkun Mangg친fa
item.description: I’ve been on a journey to document my family tree in a tech-saavy way. It started off simple: try and find out who my great-grandparents were. I honestly didn’t think I’d get past that because before this I couldn’t even tell you the names of any of my great-grandparents. But as you’ll soon find out, my simple task turned into a research-heavy adventure which is still ongoing. This wasn’t on my to-do list until recently - I’d say within the last 2 years.

item.title: Ha'친nen "Liberasi칩n"
item.description: TW/CW: Mentions of war. I can’t recall a time when my family celebrated “Liberation Day”. I can recall times that we volunteered at the Sons & Daughters of Guam Club for Liberation fiestas: cleaning, cooking, setting up & breaking down, etc…but being young, I wasn’t interested in the “whys” of fiestas. But celebrating at home? T친ya'. I’m positive there’s complexities behind that. I mean, growing up I only ever heard one story about the war from my dad’s mom.

item.title: Hu Fa'mamaolek Esti na Blog
item.description: H친fa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung! Hu tungu' na tumaigui yu' giya guini, lao hu prometi hamyu na ti 친pmam bai tutuhun m친nggi' guini. Buenti gumuaha tiempo-ku gi mamaila' na sem친na, lao siempri gi mamaila' na mes - puedi ti m친s an친kku' sa' malago' yu' fa’maolek esti na blog. Bai hu tulaika i “theme” ya hu tungu' na gumuaha meggai tinilaika siha ni' hu chek pat chagi. Todu ha' para p친’gu.

item.title: Kumeke'etsisiu Yu' Kada Ha'친ni
item.description: Cha'-hu dagi hamyu. Kumahulo' yu' gi taftaf ogga’an kada ha’친ni ya ti malago' ha' yu' umetsisiu. Hu tungu' na etsisiu u na’labr친bu yu', lao mapput para hu sodda' i metgot-hu. LAO mag친het na kumeke’etsisiu yu' kada ogga’an, pat atu’친si kada ha’친ni…pat kada sem친na, haha. Esta hu chachagi kum친nnu' labr친bun n칠ngkanu: meggai gollai, meggai golosina, ya ti hu chagi kum친nnu' mampus k친tni (lao hu chagi kum친nnu' n칠ngkanu ginen i tasi kada si침a yu'.

item.title: Biba Mes Chamoru!
item.description: H친fa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung! P친’gu na ha’친ni i tinituhun-침a nu Mes Chamoru! Hu tungu' na ti sessu m친ngge' yu' guini, lao hu prometi hamyu na hu chachagi! Kada diha gof tinani' ha' yu': guaha mampus che’cho'-hu, guaha mampus tarehan guma' put eskuela, ya manh친halom ha' ham yan i manggaf친-hu gi un nuebun guma'. Ai adai, fann친’i yu' i anim친s-miyu fan. Siempri bai kef친ngge' guini, kolo’lo’침a sa' p친’gu i Mes Chamoru.

item.title: Guaha Mampus Para Cho'gui
item.description: Ai adai, dispensa na gof atrasao ini na blog! Gi minag친het, sen tinani' yu' lao guaha maolek na rason na taiguini. Na’kadada' un an친kku' na istoria: ti apmam bai in fa침친ga gi nuebun guma', yan i ma침ain친-hu yan che’lu-hu. Ohala' mohon na ti apmam si침a m친nggi' yu' kosa ki si침a hu sang친ni hamyu h친fa nuebu gi lina’l친'-hu. Esta otro tiempu nai! Todu ha' para p친’gu. Bula guinaiya! — DJT.

item.title: I Lahi-hu Kumpreprendi i Ilelek-hu
item.description: Kada diha hu usa fino' Chamoru gi i gima'-hu yan i famili친-ku, i asagu친-hu yan i lahi-hu, si Lorie yan si Leo. Gi minag친het, ti sessu hu usa nuebu na pal친bra siha yan siha, lao siempri hu adingani siha gi fino' Chamoru. Guaha na bi친hi na hu ke’usa nuebu na pal친bra siha, pi칩t yan i lahi-hu, ya kada diha si침a manli’i' yu' na ha na’la’tungu' gui'. Hu tungu' na ha kumprendi annai hu sang친ni gui':

item.title: Minalago' Siha Para I Tinilaikan I Sakkan
item.description: H친fa adai todus hamyu! Guaha un nuebun s친kkan ya malago' yu' pum친tti hamyu ni hinasso-ku siha para iyo-ku blog para i mamaila' s친kkan. Guaha ideha-hu siha na hinasso-ku siempri na’d친ngkulu i tiningu'-hu gi Fino' Chamoru, ya eyu nai bai m친nggi' put: Manggaf친-hu Nengk친nu' ni' chumocho yan mama’tinas yu' Lepblo-ku siha ni' manaitai yu' Todu kosas gi Tek Esta m친nggi' yu' ni manggaf친-hu lao ya-hu bai m친nggi' nu nengk친nu', lepblo siha, yan tek, kulolo’침a put sigurid치t gi tek.
